attributes.action: Ban auto beam headlights on cars/vehicles
attributes.additional_details: I have almost crashed on multiple occasions into on coming car/s and traffic, Trees and hedges and all other obstacles on bends in the road and on the side of carriageways. I have reduced my speed considerably causing a danger to those behind me and other road users. I am constantly blinded when driving at night through the high beam along with the brightness of the headlights. The cats eyes are not visible during the blinding process resulting in the inability to determine the edges and centre of the carriageway
attributes.background: Ban their installation in all motor vehicles in the uk/Europe

rejection.details:
We're not sure if you want to ban all full beam lights or just full beam lights which have an automatic function. 

We've published this petition which you may wish to sign: 

Review the brightness of car headlights for safety: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653793
